page.title: 10Interview of a Headmaster.
page.content: Rev. John Evans is the Headmaster of Corse C of E Junior School. {What areas are the children drawn {from?}Mainly from Corse and Staunton but also from Redmarley,Eldersfield, Tirley and Hartpury.12 years ago there was a school at Staunton but it closed down and the children came here.There are 90 children at this school. {What are the pleasures/drawbacks of {country life as far as the children {are concerned?}Pleasures-Pleasant rural environment.Side roads and lanes are not very busy.Most gardens have a few acres of land.There is a lot of freedom.It is easy to keep pets because there is plenty of space.Drawbacks-You have to travel to main types of entertainment.There is no public transport in the evenings.Parents have to take children to cubs etc.Having friends from other
